title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: This one na very interesting piece wey I read. The person wey write am try wella. Personally sef, I see say e make sense. Wetin e talk be say despite the new monetary policy wey oga Meffy don put for ground e nor go fit stop vote-buying during the election. Wetin be some of the new monetary policies? Una don already know that one . For this article, the writer talk say why this new policy nor go stop vote buying na becasue of the dollarization of the Nigeria economy. Wetin this one mean? See him summaryQuote...the CBN’s monetary policy reforms are not expected to exert a fundamental change on the Nigerian dominant vote-buying culture. While it might minimise the use of the local currency for transactional politics of vote-buying, the policy is unlikely to stem the entire gamut of the thriving vote-buying “industry” in a heavily dollarised liberal democratic milieu as Nigeria.To understand am better. Make I ask, which currency wey PDAPC(PDP and APC) been use during their presidential primaries to take buy key electoral officials, delegate electors, voters? Na Naira or na dollar?Anyways, I hope say una don see small reason too. We fit still discuss am. Make una shook mouth as e dey hot?Una doh o

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: No stress boss but weda we like am or not, this vote buying matter no go end anytime soon and even if e go end, I no really sure say na for our generation because so many things dey very wrong and most times even from our very tertiary institutions you go notice say this vote buying don dey paramount as students wey be leaders of tomorrow don already dey rig elections wey suppose dey free and fair and then we still dey expect them to dey free and fair when them enter politics proper?I guess no and the only thing we dey pray for na positive change and that positive change go begin from is the citizens if we go fit refuse the money them go bring and vote in who we see fit to rule rather than selling our votes with believes that our votes don't count.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on February 07, 2023, 11:38:05 AMMake I ask, which currency wey PDAPC(PDP and APC) been use during their presidential primaries to take buy key electoral officials, delegate electors, voters? Na Naira or na dollar?Nah still the naira nah I mean the old naira way them change nia them carry buy the last vote. Lol. Even if them succeed change this money finish the way them want change am, people way go buy vote go still buy vote, because people way them been they rush to change the money for, nah still the same people way don park the new money finish, when me and you they here they suffer to get am.. This vote buying of a thing no go end for this politicians, nah just us way be the voters nia go decide weather we go take the money vote for them or not .. me I no go advice anybody make in no take any money from any body oooh, because the money nah still our country own. Take the money agree to vote for their front, when you reach were to drop your vote you carry you hand vote who they your mind.. no be them go use ur card  do the vote nah still you.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: This monetary policy no go stop vote buying oo, the way we dey complain of hardship and lack of money, e no dey affect politicians, this politicians too value power so Dem go do everything possible go collect power, and plenty citizens for naija too get this love for money, Dem prefer money pass our Nigeria to better, so they are ready to collect money from politicians to sale their vote, we dey Nigeria, this vote buying no go end...

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Wetin go make vote buying difficult na if those thieves weh be our politicians no see cash distribute and na the thing weh Emefiele deh try do. E no matter whether na dollar or naira them want to use. But some bank managers deh try sabotage Emefiele efforts by going through the back door to give those politicians cash. Na we deh do ourselves for Nigeria. We like to take shortcut and not follow due diligence. People no deh go prison for Nigeria for wrong things weh dem do once them show connection. Na all this things deh make many connected people to misbehave.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: This year general election in Nigeria will be the worst election for vote buying. Okay look at it from this angle, now there is no money in circulation to the poor masses but nobody will tell me that no politician has enough cash in their houses for the forthcoming election. We know sae no politician and stand on the queue we stand. They only make calls and have their ways with millions. Ok now when di election kick start and in di polling unit APC or PDP gives you 10k with this hardship to get cash to vote for them won't you collect it? Time will tell, let us wait and see. I will be an election observant.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: I just sit-down for one corner dey laugh out loud, because this issue of vote buying is sure electoral practice. Though not legal, but we know how it is during such election times. I doubt there had been a time in this country when during election the prices of things become cheaper or cash flow become free. The hardship and unavailable cash is more political than economic. The election is just some days away, and we would hear and see cases of vote buying more open and undisputed. Let's vote wisely so we can from now secure the future of generations coming up.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: New naira policy no fit stop vote buying for this country, ok now for Kaduna state the government say em know bank manager wey give one governorship aspirant 500million naira new notes , so even as the new naira they scarse so we people they collect am in bulk, na why the Naira scarse because our politicians done go do business with bank people to sell them the naira notes and come dey load small small money for ATM machine. Even the deadline wey dem been fix I been know say federal government put a this new naira policy in place just for the primary purpose of stopping vote buying but the supreme court done order the federal government not to ban the new naira notes so we never really know as e go be..but new naira policy no fit stop vote buying.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: I never for once ever think say this new money policy go affect big politicians. Them don sabi all this things and how to run am before we go hear about am sef. Any policy wey government bring to make even the poor man enjoy dey always fire back for the poor masses again. About vote-buying, I dey very sure say na mostly our new naira dem go use do am as local man no for know dollar as legal tender to collect.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Goodday OP!I observe something I say make I drop am sharp sharp. Like if you write the body of your thread with pidgin English, e for make sense to write the title for pidgin too. Like the title for look like this "Naija new money policy no go fit stop vote buying. Make we discuss.  E go make the whole thing look natural and more Nigerian. The new money policy for reduce vote buying drastically if say dem do am well. But the country don already dey sabotaged. Every positive plans or policy must be sabotaged.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on February 07, 2023, 11:38:05 AMTo understand am better. Make I ask, which currency wey PDAPC(PDP and APC) been use during their presidential primaries to take buy key electoral officials, delegate electors, voters? Na Naira or na dollar?I no go lie you eh, I bin see this act as one stupid thing way our politicians do nd yet bin dey accepted wthin the circle of dere rights. For we naija, na naira we savi so, why some pple in a leadership determinant process go con dey spend another nation currency, completely ignoring our own via watin, say e no get weight? If our economy bin good, naira no for get weight? Them don flat our currency to a stage way to say, e dey alarming na understatement. We going extinct on this as it is.Anyway, d monetary policy remains a step forward. At least, the rate go drop and even the awakening way dey go on this time na another plus for everybody. Na why we need get am right this time.

comments.author: Rockson1
comments.body: Vote buying in Nigeria is a very big problems in the society to where politician have used the system to kill the development  national growth of nation Nigeria, how can we stop vote buying in Nigeria even as the monetary policy came on board it was still high gaq by the so call politician, I believe introducing crypto currency into our electoral system will be a welcome development to the electoral system.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: When I give up na when I see say upon the whole plenty money were CBN offload give bank before the first deadline of the naira swap, we still have naira scarcity during this time and na there I know say this whole money crisis is more politically motivated than a policy summer suit., some people the say the CBN failed to properly implement this new monetary policy but the fact says. -Corrupt politicians are behind the whole scarcity of both fuel and the naira so that they can improvise the citizens, this way when the hunger is too much for Nigerians they go sell their vote for whatever amount they're offered. -The politicians hide the money from circulation so that they can use it during the election,  but they forget the day after the election the policy go continue with probes of misuse of the naira during the election.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: You see this vote buying of a thing, em no fit stop for this our country no matter how the government try to fight, preach, or stop am. Em no fit work.You no know sae all this new naira palava wey the happen for this country, the game plan na to find ways on how curtail the rate of vote buying for this coming election.  but wetin come be of it at the end? We d hear sae the supreme court don pass judge sae, the old and new naira are legally tender for the whole country.You see as this new and old naira notes come d scarce for the country, the moment the election don pass, you go see how em go full for the country. Just d watch and see.You suppose to the ask the trillions of new naira notes wey d CBN print give banks where you think sae em d? Na the politicians hold am for their houses wey them go share during election time

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on February 07, 2023, 11:38:05 AMTo understand am better. Make I ask, which currency wey PDAPC(PDP and APC) been use during their presidential primaries to take buy key electoral officials, delegate electors, voters? Na Naira or na dollar?Anyways, I hope say una don see small reason too. We fit still discuss am. Make una shook mouth as e dey hot?Una doh oThat was primaries and not a general election, the use of dollars no go work for general election as people no go gree accept am self. Nobody sabi how fake dollars or even sabi how the real ones dey so dem go believe say na fake currency dem dey give dem so that's if we think say na dollars dis people go fall back to use buy vote. I believe say this political dey work with banks already to hoard cash wey dem gi use in vite buying. The only thing this new policy do na to make am very difficult but e no make am impossible. Banks na thief and bank managers ready to work hand in hand with any politician wey go cut them better percentage.No be story we dey hear say one governor dey withdraw millions from banks meanwhile dem dey claim say banks no get money to dispense. Okay abi you wan tell me say the like of Tinubu no go get access to any billions wey him wan received from the banks while giving dem a juicy percentage? Abi we dey forget say politicians get shares dem fir must of this banks and dem gi wan dey on their good side incase of anything. The policy no go stop anything as agents for still dey do electronical transfer to use buy the vote without it been linked to the politician.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: No precaution measures Nigeria won take to stop vote buying because corruption don eat Nigerians marrow. Emefiele plan don fail,if e think say through the redisgn of naira note go stop vote buying. The Senior INEC officials or those people wey dey on top na transfer the politicians go use pay them. Then the street voter sellers na new naira note cash na e dem go take pay them. All the parties wey won do vote buying do get their block of new naira note wey dem won use but vote,all these things na e lead to scarcity of the new note. Infact, I see am say the two parties fit even use am as a strategy to buy more votes by paying with new naira not and if the other party no pay with new naira note,no surprise say people no go vote for the party wey dey pay with old naira note. Nigerians are crazy and can do funny things. LOL

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Anyhow dem want change the policy vote buying na something wey go dey hard to stop because poverty don do us something wey be say many people dey see vote buying as normal thing. This our politicians don use poverty trap the citizens and some of us the see election period as the time to collect our own share of the national cake, say when dem don steal the nation's money say na the only time to collect from them but we no kno say we dey enslave ourselves.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on February 07, 2023, 11:38:05 AMMake una shook mouth as e dey hot?Money is now more difficult for the common Nigerian to see. POS agents have reduced because of the unavailability of the new naira notes, banks no longer accept the old naira notes and some people are stuck with them, plus when person manage see the money, to withdraw your own money, the charges na die. We know say some of this stress wey common Nigerians dey face, big men nor dey see am like that, most of them wey get level well well dun already coordinate with bank, dem get the new notes already enough, and those in politics in preparation for the election. The way things dy go, na two effects the current situation fit cause  to the matter of vote buying;- People go dey evex generally for the government and go want these old people out.- As people nor see money, plus with the money many Nigerians dun spend this period, dem fit collect the new naira when dem see am, vote for anybody wey dey give them.Election dun close well well, I hope we can get it right this time.
